name: Feed The Beast (Quick Game Builds)
description:
You are a mage who has been tasked with saving all of humanity by keeping the beasts that have appeared in your lands.  The reason this has fallen on you is the only things you can conjure are food and poop you have no lightning, fire or ice just Cake,  Burgers and Chicken Drumsticks.

This is a very early demo build that I submitted it 18/03 and I only started on it 17/03 originally for the Mini Jam
